title: Beyond A Reasonable Doubt - August 19, 2021
itunes:title: Beyond A Reasonable Doubt - August 19, 2021
description:
Mark and Gary welcome back to the show Geragos & Geragos associate & sports law expert Dan Lust to talk about the breaking developments in the Trevor Bauer situation.

Watch Beyond A Reasonable Doubt on YouTube at YouTube.com/ReasonableDoubtPodcast and subscribe while you're there.
